item.title: 部分法国特斯拉司机就马斯克行为造成的伤害提起诉讼
item.description: 代表特斯拉车主的律师事务所周三表示，法国一小群特斯拉车主正在起诉埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）经营的这家汽车制造商，称特斯拉汽车已成为 "极右图腾"，损害了他们的声誉。【原文：A small group of Tesla owners in France is suing the carmaker run by Elon Musk, alleging its vehicles have become "far-right totems" that are harming their reputation, the law firm representing the group said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 在后期研究中，Novavax 的 COVID 流感组合疫苗和单独的流感疫苗都能提高免疫力
item.description: 诺维信公司（Novavax）周三表示，在一项后期研究中，该公司的试验性 COVID-19 流感混合疫苗和独立流感疫苗在一些接受测试的患者中显示出强烈的免疫反应。【原文：Novavax's experimental COVID-19-influenza combination and standalone influenza vaccines showed strong immune responses in some patients tested in a late-stage study, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英伟达、Perplexity 与欧洲企业合作，共同推动本地人工智能模型的发展
item.description: 英伟达（Nvidia）和人工智能搜索公司Perplexity周三表示，他们正在与欧洲和中东的十多家人工智能公司合作，完善这些公司的人工智能技术，并将其分发给当地企业。【原文：Nvidia and artificial intelligence search firm Perplexity on Wednesday said they are partnering with more than a dozen AI firms in Europe and the Middle East to refine those firms' AI technologies and distribute them to local businesses.】

item.title: 关税可能成为欧洲单一市场所需的动力
item.description: 为了将电子废料和其他废物从欧盟各地运到比利时的回收工厂，材料集团优美科至少需要花费一个月的时间来处理一系列复杂的国家运输规则。【原文：To bring electronic scrap and other waste from across the European Union to its Belgian recycling plant, materials group Umicore can spend at least a month tackling a complex array of national shipment rules.】

item.title: 美国 中美框架下的压力
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: Jio BlackRock 获监管部门批准在印度开展投资顾问业务
item.description: 据母公司 Jio Financial Services 称，Jio BlackRock Investment Advisers (JBIAPL) 已获得印度市场监管机构的批准，可以作为投资顾问开展业务。【原文：Jio BlackRock Investment Advisers (JBIAPL) has received approval from India's markets regulator to operate as an investment adviser, according to its parent company, Jio Financial Services .】

item.title: Meta 和 TikTok 在欧盟第二最高法院挑战技术收费
item.description: Meta Platforms 和 TikTok 周三将与技术监管机构的斗争提交给欧洲第二最高法院，称欧盟对它们征收的监管费不相称，而且所依据的方法有缺陷。【原文：Meta Platforms and TikTok said a European Union supervisory fee levied on them was disproportionate and based on a flawed methodology as they took their fight with tech regulators to Europe's second highest court on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家：意大利要求美国澄清因中国投资者而对倍耐力实施的限制措施
item.description: 两位熟知内情的消息人士告诉路透社，由于倍耐力轮胎的中国投资者，意大利政府担心华盛顿可能会对倍耐力施加国内限制，因此意大利政府正在寻求美国的澄清。【原文：The Italian government is seeking clarity from the United States amid concerns that Washington could impose domestic restrictions on Pirelli due to the tyremaker's Chinese investor, two sources familiar with the matter told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国贸易谈判缺乏细节，美股期货下跌，CPI成为焦点
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货走低，此前中美贸易谈判几乎没有为长期贸易紧张局势提供持久解决方案的迹象，而投资者则将注意力转向了关键的通胀数据。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged lower on Wednesday after U.S.-China trade talks offered little sign of a durable resolution to their longstanding trade tensions, while investors turned their focus to a key inflation reading.】

item.title: 根据共和党税收法案，各州将难以管理食品券福利
item.description: 据各州官员、地方政府协会和政策专家称，如果共和党税收法案中一项迫使各州承担数十亿美元新成本的提案签署成为法律，那么美国各州将无法全面管理为全国数百万穷人提供的食品券福利。【原文：U.S. states will not be able to fully administer food stamp benefits for millions of the nation's poor if a proposal in the Republican tax bill forcing them to shoulder billions of dollars in new costs is signed into law, according to state officials, local government associations and policy experts.】

item.title: 美国将恢复对瑞士投资顾问的认证
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission）和瑞士金融市场监管机构金融市场管理局（FINMA）周二分别发表声明称，美国将恢复处理瑞士实体提出的旨在成为美国注册投资顾问的申请。【原文：The U.S. will resume processing applications from Swiss entities aiming to become registered investment advisers in the U.S., the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission and Swiss financial market regulator FINMA said in separate statements on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国加征关税挤压蓝莓出口，秘鲁转向中国
item.description: 随着产量的增加，秘鲁的种植者们正在寻找新的市场，而他们最好的客户--美国，正在对世界各地的合作伙伴发动贸易关税战。【原文：Growers in Peru are looking for new markets as production rises and their best customer, the United States, is waging a trade tariff war on partners around the world.】

item.title: 以色列数据安全公司 Cyera 融资 5.4 亿美元，估值 60 亿美元
item.description: 以色列数据安全初创公司 Cyera 周三表示，它在一轮后期私募融资中筹集了 5.4 亿美元，使其估值达到 60 亿美元。【原文：Israeli data security startup Cyera said on Wednesday it raised $540 million in a late-stage private funding round to bring its valuation to $6 billion.】

item.title: 美国进口商求助于中间商来应对特朗普时代的关税，但代价不菲
item.description: 美国进口商越来越依赖报关行来跟上唐纳德-特朗普总统不断变化的贸易政策。但业内人士告诉路透社，对帮助处理外国货物的蓬勃需求使这些服务变得更加昂贵，为关税负担增加了另一项成本。【原文：U.S. importers are increasingly relying on customs brokers to keep up with President Donald Trump’s ever-changing trade policies. But booming demand for help in processing foreign goods has made these services more expensive, adding another cost to the tariff burden, industry players told Reuters.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官称量子计算正处于拐点
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋周三在巴黎举行的 VivaTech 会议上重申，量子计算技术正处于拐点。【原文：Quantum computing technology is at an inflection point, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang reiterated on Wednesday at the VivaTech conference in Paris.】

item.title: 随着美国贸易休战重回正轨，一些中国出口商正在 "慢慢死去
item.description: Jacky Ren是中国一家厨房电器工厂的老板，他说，他所在行业的出口商为了留住美国客户，现在都在亏本销售，对于面临更高关税的产品的降价要求，他们几乎没有能力说 "不"。【原文：Jacky Ren, who owns a kitchen appliance factory in China, says exporters in his industry are now selling at a loss to keep their U.S. clients, with little power to say "no" to requests for lower prices on products facing higher tariffs.】

item.title: 华为推出 Pura 80 智能手机系列，迈出重返中国的下一步
item.description: 中国科技巨头华为公司（HWT.UL）周三推出了 Pura 80 系列智能手机，该公司力图巩固其在美国多年制裁后在中国高端智能手机市场的地位。【原文：Chinese tech giant Huawei (HWT.UL) launched its Pura 80 smartphone series on Wednesday, as the company seeks to cement its comeback in China's premium smartphone market following years of U.S. sanctions.】

item.title: 消息人士称，摩洛哥皇家航空公司接近达成波音和空客喷气机交易
item.description: 业内消息人士称，空中客车公司即将与摩洛哥皇家航空公司（Royal Air Maroc）达成约20架A220小型客机的交易，在这家北非航空公司准备与美国波音公司续签更广泛的喷气机订单之际站稳脚跟。【原文：Airbus is nearing a deal with Royal Air Maroc for around 20 of its small A220 passenger jets, gaining a foothold as the North African carrier also prepares to renew U.S. ties with a broader jet Boeing order, industry sources said.】

item.title: 日本在 6 月经济报告中对关税影响保持谨慎态度
item.description: 日本政府在周三的月度报告中重申了美国关税对经济增长所带来风险的警告，称需要关注美国关税对企业利润的潜在影响。【原文：Japan's government reiterated its warning on the risks from U.S. tariffs on economic growth, saying in a monthly report on Wednesday that the potential impact on corporate profits needed attention.】

item.title: 摩根大通因关税风险缓解和去美元化趋势上调人民币汇率预期
item.description: 摩根大通（JPMorgan）周三上调了中国在岸人民币即期价格的年末预期，理由是美国贸易战的风险有所缓和，以及所谓的去美元化这一更广泛的全球主题。【原文：JPMorgan lifted its end-of-year forecast for China's onshore yuan spot price on Wednesday, citing moderating risks around the U.S. trade war and a broader global theme of so-called de-dollarisation.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，通用磨坊考虑出售中国哈根达斯门店
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，通用磨坊公司正在考虑出售其在中国的哈根达斯冰淇淋店。【原文：General Mills is considering selling its Haagen-Dazs ice-cream stores in China, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，越航正在洽谈在巴黎航展前订购约 100 架空客喷气机
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引熟知内情的消息人士的话报道，VietJet Aviation JSC 正在洽谈增购约 100 架空中客车公司窄体喷气式飞机，最早可能在下周的巴黎航展上达成交易。【原文：VietJet Aviation JSC is in talks to order around 100 additional Airbus SE narrowbody jets, with a potential deal as early as the Paris Air Show next week, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美元不断失去市场份额，但欧元也不是赢家：欧洲央行研究
item.description: 欧洲央行的一份报告显示，去年美元作为世界主要货币的市场份额继续下降，但主要受益的是较小的竞争对手和黄金，而不是欧元，后者希望填补因对美元信心下降而留下的空白。【原文：The dollar continued to lose market share last year as the world's dominant currency but mostly smaller rivals and gold benefited rather than the euro, which aspires to fill any void left by receding confidence in the greenback, an ECB report showed.】

item.title: 星巴克首席执行官告诉英国《金融时报》，星巴克对入股中国业务 "兴趣浓厚"。
item.description: 星巴克首席执行官周三在接受英国《金融时报》采访时表示，星巴克对出售其中国业务的股份 "兴趣浓厚"，因为这家美国咖啡连锁店希望重振其第二大市场的销售业绩。【原文：Starbucks has received "a lot of interest" in the sale of a stake in its China business, its chief executive told the Financial Times in an interview published on Wednesday, as the U.S. coffee chain looks to revive sales in its second-largest market.】

item.title: 校园刺伤事件发生后，马克龙将推动禁止 15 岁以下青少年使用社交媒体
item.description: 法国东部一所学校发生致命刺伤事件后，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙表示，他将推动欧盟制定法规，禁止 15 岁以下儿童使用社交媒体。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron said he would push for European Union regulation to ban social media for children under the age of 15 after a fatal stabbing at a school in eastern France, the latest such violent attack that left the country reeling.】

item.title: 意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官称达成 BPM 银行交易的可能性不超过 20
item.description: 联合信贷银行首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 周三表示，联合信贷银行通过收购较小同行 Banco BPM 的可能性最多只有 20%。【原文：The chances that UniCredit can see through its takeover bid for smaller peer Banco BPM are at best 20%, CEO Andrea Orcel said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日产供应商马瑞利申请破产保护，获得 11 亿美元新融资
item.description: 日产汽车零部件供应商马瑞利公司（Marelli Corp）周三在一份声明中说，在与债权人的谈判出现几个月的不确定性之后，该公司在美国申请了破产保护。【原文：Nissan supplier Marelli Corp filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection in the United States on Wednesday, the Japanese auto parts company said in a statement, after months of uncertainty about its talks with creditors.】

item.title: 马斯克说他对自己发表的一些关于特朗普的帖子感到后悔
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）周三在其社交媒体平台 X 上留言说，他对上周发表的一些关于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的帖子感到遗憾。【原文：Billionaire Elon Musk said on Wednesday that he regrets some of the posts he made last week about U.S President Donald Trump, in a message on his social media platform X.】

item.title: Polestar 重启法国市场扩张
item.description: 瑞典高端汽车制造商 Polestar 的高层告诉路透社，该公司将于今年开始在法国交付电动汽车，目标是将法国打造成其三大欧洲市场之一。【原文：Swedish premium carmaker Polestar will start delivering its electric vehicles in France this year with the goal of making it one of its three main European markets, its top executive for the country told Reuters.】

item.title: 凯德集团将于今年夏天推出人工智能招聘服务
item.description: 与政府、军队和公司合作的英国外包公司 Capita 表示，它正在利用人工智能将招聘工作从数周缩短到数小时，并将在今年夏天推出与 Salesforce Inc 合作开发的这项服务。【原文：Capita , a British outsourcer that works with government, armed forces and companies, said it was using AI to cut recruitment from weeks to just hours, and it would roll out the service, developed with Salesforce Inc , this summer.】
